title: 'Sell America' is back: All the biggest moves today as Trump whips up fresh market turmoil
full_text: 'Sell America' is back: All the biggest moves today as Trump whips up fresh market turmoil. Stocks, bonds, and the dollar fell amid the DOJ's investigation into Powell. Credit card stocks plunged after Trump said interest should be capped.. The "sell America" trade is seeing a revival on Monday. Investors were reacting to developments over the weekend, including a proposal to cap credit card interest rates and the Department of Justic… [+4589 chars]
